divs: Sighting Detailsi was lookin out my front porch door and,it came out of a storm cloud. i could see that there a big dot in front of the flame plume,if it was a asteriod,it wouldnt have changed directions. it was pretty impressive,,a very long tail,,not anything close to a high flying jet,,,,,,,not like a con trail that hangs in the sky for a while,it stayed right behind it .... we have had quite a few earthquakes in this area ,,the dogs in the neiborhood were barking like ,,,here it comes again,,get ready.. thats when i went out to the porch ,,even my dog was whining. thats when i saw it,,,all i can say is wow ,,i thought we was gonna get slammmed by an asteriod,,till it changed directions. sorry i dont have a video cam,,,if i had one i had time to get it and capture it on video for ya,,it was pretty cool to see.
Summary: maybe it was a asteriod but it changed directions
trends: There have been no other sightings in Albion
This sighting has never been favorited.
